text: Tumi sihamtaka dekha na'ine? Yisakale dabi karae ye, tomara prati yi aratirna haiche arau tomara purbe yi aratirna haiche tata sihamte imana aniche, athaca sihamte tagutara ocarata bicarapraarthi haâ€™ba bicarae, yadi'o se'itoka pratyakhyana karaara babe sihamtaka nirdesa diya haichila; arau cayatane sihamtaka bhisanabharae pathabhrasta karaiba bicarae
